name: bls-signatures-pod
summary: BLS signatures in C++, using the relic toolkit
description: Implements BLS signatures with aggregation as in Boneh, Drijvers, Neven 2018, using relic toolkit for cryptographic primitives (pairings, EC, hashing). The BLS12-381 curve is used.
prepare_command:
set -x

    MIN_IOS="10.0"

    IPHONEOS_PLATFORM_STR=iphoneos
    IPHONEOS_PLATFORM=`xcrun --sdk ${IPHONEOS_PLATFORM_STR} --show-sdk-platform-path`
    IPHONEOS_SDK=`xcrun --sdk ${IPHONEOS_PLATFORM_STR} --show-sdk-path`

    IPHONESIMULATOR_PLATFORM_STR=iphonesimulator
    IPHONESIMULATOR_PLATFORM=`xcrun --sdk ${IPHONESIMULATOR_PLATFORM_STR} --show-sdk-platform-path`
    IPHONESIMULATOR_SDK=`xcrun --sdk ${IPHONESIMULATOR_PLATFORM_STR} --show-sdk-path`


    build_gmp()
    {
        CURRENT_DIR=`pwd`
        DEVELOPER=`xcode-select --print-path`

        GMP_VERSION="6.1.2"

        BITCODE="-fembed-bitcode"
        SDKVERSION=`xcrun -sdk iphoneos --show-sdk-version`
        if [ "${SDKVERSION}" == "9.0" ]; then
            BITCODE=""
        fi

        CLANG=`xcrun --sdk iphoneos --find clang`
        CLANGPP=`xcrun --sdk iphoneos --find clang++`

        build_gmp_arch()
        {
            ARCH=$1
            SDK=$2
            PLATFORM=$3
            ARGS=$4

            make clean || true
            make distclean || true

            export PATH="${PLATFORM}/Developer/usr/bin:${DEVELOPER}/usr/bin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin:/usr/sbin:/sbin"

            mkdir gmplib-${ARCH}

            EXTRAS="-miphoneos-version-min=${MIN_IOS} -no-integrated-as -arch ${ARCH} -target ${ARCH}-apple-darwin"

            CFLAGS="${BITCODE} -isysroot ${SDK} -Wno-error -Wno-implicit-function-declaration ${EXTRAS}"

            ./configure --prefix="${CURRENT_DIR}/gmplib-${ARCH}" CC="${CLANG} ${CFLAGS}"  CPP="${CLANG} -E"  CPPFLAGS="${CFLAGS}"             --host=aarch64-apple-darwin --disable-assembly --enable-static --disable-shared ${ARGS}

            make -j `sysctl -n hw.logicalcpu_max` &> "${CURRENT_DIR}/gmplib-${ARCH}-build.log"
            make install &> "${CURRENT_DIR}/gmplib-${ARCH}-install.log"
        }

        if [ ! -s ${CURRENT_DIR}/gmp-${GMP_VERSION}.tar.bz2 ]; then
            curl -L -o ${CURRENT_DIR}/gmp-${GMP_VERSION}.tar.bz2 https://gmplib.org/download/gmp/gmp-${GMP_VERSION}.tar.bz2
        fi

        rm -rf gmp
        tar xfj "gmp-${GMP_VERSION}.tar.bz2"
        mv gmp-${GMP_VERSION} gmp

        pushd gmp

        CURRENT_DIR=`pwd`

        build_gmp_arch "armv7s" "${IPHONEOS_SDK}" "${IPHONEOS_PLATFORM}" 
        build_gmp_arch "arm64" "${IPHONEOS_SDK}" "${IPHONEOS_PLATFORM}" 
        build_gmp_arch "i386" "${IPHONESIMULATOR_SDK}" "${IPHONESIMULATOR_PLATFORM}"
        build_gmp_arch "x86_64" "${IPHONESIMULATOR_SDK}" "${IPHONESIMULATOR_PLATFORM}"

        cp -r ${CURRENT_DIR}/gmplib-x86_64/include .

        mkdir lib

        lipo             "${CURRENT_DIR}/gmplib-armv7s/lib/libgmp.a"             "${CURRENT_DIR}/gmplib-arm64/lib/libgmp.a"             "${CURRENT_DIR}/gmplib-i386/lib/libgmp.a"             "${CURRENT_DIR}/gmplib-x86_64/lib/libgmp.a"             -create -output lib/libgmp.a

        popd # gmp

        pwd
    }


    relic_target_dir()
    {
        ARCH=$1
        echo "relic-target-${ARCH}"
    }


    build_relic()
    {
        pushd contrib/relic

        SHA256_HASH="f01aec9c094be1cd00d094c83c14bb2730a0741f845c78e8568884bcbdcd3204"
        curl -o ios.toolchain.cmake https://raw.githubusercontent.com/leetal/ios-cmake/6ea5db18f9a05b4103e2aca665374b94c119fbed/ios.toolchain.cmake
        DOWNLOADED_HASH=`shasum -a 256 ios.toolchain.cmake | cut -f 1 -d " "`
        if [ $SHA256_HASH != $DOWNLOADED_HASH ]; then
          echo "Error: sha256 checksum of ios.toolchain.cmake mismatch" >&2
          exit 1
        fi

        build_relic_arch()
        {
            ARCH=$1
            SDK=$2
            PLATFORM=$3

            BUILDDIR=$(relic_target_dir "${ARCH}")
            rm -rf "$BUILDDIR"
            mkdir "$BUILDDIR"
            pushd "$BUILDDIR"

            unset CC
            export CC=`xcrun --sdk ${PLATFORM} --find clang`

            WSIZE=64
            IOS_PLATFORM=OS64
            OPTIMIZATIONFLAGS=-fomit-frame-pointer
            if [[ "${ARCH}" != "arm64" && "${ARCH}" != "x86_64" ]]; then
                WSIZE=32
                IOS_PLATFORM=OS
                OPTIMIZATIONFLAGS=""
            fi

            EXTRA_ARGS=""
            if [[ "${ARCH}" != "i386" && "${ARCH}" != "x86_64" ]]; then
                EXTRA_ARGS="-DARCH=ARM -DOPSYS=NONE -DIOS_PLATFORM=$IOS_PLATFORM -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=../ios.toolchain.cmake"
                if [[ "${ARCH}" != "arm64" ]]; then
                    EXTRA_ARGS+=" -DIOS_ARCH=armv7s"
                fi
            fi

            CURRENT_DIR=`pwd`

            cmake -DCMAKE_PREFIX_PATH:PATH="${GMP_DIR}" -DTESTS=0 -DBENCH=0 -DCHECK=off -DARITH=gmp -DFP_PRIME=381             -DFP_QNRES=off -DFP_METHD="INTEG;INTEG;INTEG;MONTY;LOWER;SLIDE" -DFPX_METHD="INTEG;INTEG;LAZYR" -DPP_METHD="LAZYR;OATEP"             -DCOMP="-O3 -funroll-loops $OPTIMIZATIONFLAGS -isysroot $SDK -arch $ARCH -fembed-bitcode" -DWSIZE=$WSIZE             -DVERBS=off -DSHLIB=off -DALLOC="AUTO" -DEP_PLAIN=off -DEP_SUPER=off -DPP_EXT="LAZYR" -DTIMER="HREAL" ${EXTRA_ARGS} ../

            make

            popd # "$BUILDDIR"
        }

        build_relic_arch "armv7s" "${IPHONEOS_SDK}" "${IPHONEOS_PLATFORM_STR}"
        build_relic_arch "arm64" "${IPHONEOS_SDK}" "${IPHONEOS_PLATFORM_STR}"
        build_relic_arch "i386" "${IPHONESIMULATOR_SDK}" "${IPHONESIMULATOR_PLATFORM_STR}"
        build_relic_arch "x86_64" "${IPHONESIMULATOR_SDK}" "${IPHONESIMULATOR_PLATFORM_STR}"

        xcrun lipo             "$(relic_target_dir "armv7s")/lib/librelic_s.a"             "$(relic_target_dir "arm64")/lib/librelic_s.a"             "$(relic_target_dir "i386")/lib/librelic_s.a"             "$(relic_target_dir "x86_64")/lib/librelic_s.a"             -create -output "librelic.a"

        popd # contrib/relic
    }


    build_bls()
    {
        BLS_FILES=( "aggregationinfo" "bls" "chaincode" "extendedprivatekey" "extendedpublickey" "privatekey" "publickey" "signature" )
        ALL_BLS_OBJ_FILES=$(printf "%s.o " "${BLS_FILES[@]}")

        bls_target_dir()
        {
            ARCH=$1
            echo "bls-target-${ARCH}"
        }

        build_bls_arch()
        {
            ARCH=$1
            SDK=$2

            BUILDDIR=$(bls_target_dir "${ARCH}")
            rm -rf "$BUILDDIR"
            mkdir "$BUILDDIR"
            pushd "$BUILDDIR"

            CURRENT_DIR=`pwd`

            EXTRA_ARGS=""
            if [[ "${ARCH}" != "i386" && "${ARCH}" != "x86_64" ]]; then
                EXTRA_ARGS="-miphoneos-version-min=${MIN_IOS}"
            fi

            for F in "${BLS_FILES[@]}"
            do
                clang -I"../contrib/relic/include" -I"../contrib/relic/$(relic_target_dir "${ARCH}")/include" -I"../src/" -I"${GMP_DIR}/include"                 -x c++ -std=c++14 -stdlib=libc++ -arch "${ARCH}" -isysroot "${SDK}" ${EXTRA_ARGS} -c "../src/${F}.cpp" -o "${CURRENT_DIR}/${F}.o"
            done

            ar -cvq libbls.a $ALL_BLS_OBJ_FILES

            popd # "$BUILDDIR"
        }

        build_bls_arch "armv7s" "${IPHONEOS_SDK}"
        build_bls_arch "arm64" "${IPHONEOS_SDK}"
        build_bls_arch "i386" "${IPHONESIMULATOR_SDK}"
        build_bls_arch "x86_64" "${IPHONESIMULATOR_SDK}"

        xcrun lipo             "$(bls_target_dir "armv7s")/libbls.a"             "$(bls_target_dir "arm64")/libbls.a"             "$(bls_target_dir "i386")/libbls.a"             "$(bls_target_dir "x86_64")/libbls.a"             -create -output "libbls.a"
    }


    make_relic_universal()
    {
        RELIC_ARM64_TARGET_DIR=$(relic_target_dir "arm64")

        perl -p -e 's/#define WSIZE.*/#ifdef __LP64__
#define WSIZE 64
#else
#define WSIZE 32
#endif/'         "contrib/relic/${RELIC_ARM64_TARGET_DIR}/include/relic_conf.h"         > "contrib/relic/${RELIC_ARM64_TARGET_DIR}/include/relic_conf.h.new"

        rm "contrib/relic/${RELIC_ARM64_TARGET_DIR}/include/relic_conf.h"
        mv "contrib/relic/${RELIC_ARM64_TARGET_DIR}/include/relic_conf.h.new" "contrib/relic/${RELIC_ARM64_TARGET_DIR}/include/relic_conf.h"   
    }


    build_gmp
    GMP_DIR="`pwd`/gmp"

    build_relic

    build_bls

    make_relic_universal
